LanguageData.WAW.FoundZeroPawns: Found zero combat pawns on this tech level.
LanguageData.WAW.NoCustomPawnKinds: There's no custom pawnkinds, please create new.
LanguageData.WAW.YouCanRename: Do you know you can rename warbands?
LanguageData.WAW.ZeroFound: There's no active warband that can raid.
LanguageData.WAW.AddSkillToSoldier: Add {0} points of {1} skill to all soldiers.
LanguageData.WAW.RecoveryRate: Soldiers require {0}% less days to recover from injuries.
LanguageData.WAW.NotImplemented: Recruiting skill is not yet implemented.
LanguageData.WAW.LootValueBuff: Silvers returned will be {0}% of loots' value.
LanguageData.WAW.ExplainExp: Exp can be gained by raiding, defending and using "Interact" button of the warband.
LanguageData.WAW.RespawnChance: Soldiers have a {0}% chance to be not counted as dead when they are killed.
LanguageData.WAW.RecruitCost: Recruiting new soldiers costs {0}% less silvers.
LanguageData.WAW.CantMove: Cannot move from one place to another
LanguageData.WAW.ModNotLoaded: Mod {0} is required for this option
LanguageData.WAW.RequireSkill: Require at least {1} level of leader's {0} skill
LanguageData.WAW.SelectOneRequest: Please select at least one custom pawn kind.
LanguageData.WAW.CastersOverflow: There can be at most 3 psycasters.
LanguageData.WAW.RecruitPsycasters.Desc: Recruit trained psycasters from the empire, sending these psycasters out cost elex.
LanguageData.WAW.EltexTip: You can click on one of the three slots to clear selection.
LanguageData.WAW.FactionOverride: Decide warband's faction type, this will override the ideology (Ideology DLC) and race (HAR mod) of generated soldiers.
LanguageData.WAW.InsufficientPsycaster: No psycaster in the team, please recuruit more from "recruit psycasters" window.
LanguageData.WAW.SaveVillage.Desc: A group of villagers need your help! They claimed that a some raiders recently took over their settlement and they begger help from our troops. \nThey have promised they would join the league and provide services for our warbands.
